document_data.name: Urdsrest
document_data.location-WT: [[Banehold|Barrens of Doom and Despair]]<ref group="note" name="note1">Kuraulyek's realm under the World Tree cosmology was never actually named. However, it is assumed that it retained its name from the Great Wheel cosmology like other realms.
document_data.Location:
In the [[Great Wheel cosmology]], Urdsrest was located in a cavern inside a hill on [[Oinos]] in [[Hades]].

In the [[World Tree cosmology]], Kuraulyek's realm was located in the [[Underdark]] of the [[ Barrens of Doom and Despair]].
document_data.Features: The place was described as being gloomy.
document_data.Purpose: Urdsrest's purpose was to be Kuraulyek's hiding spot. He never set a foot outside of it because he feared [[Kurtulmak]]'s revenge for putting the entire [[kobold]] race at risk of extinction with his cowardice.
